contentrichtext.text: '''Didier Pfirter''' (born 1959, [[Basel]]) is a [[Switzerland|Swiss]] [[diplomat]]. He was the legal advisor to [[Ãlvaro de Soto]], the Special Cyprus Advisor of the [[United Nations|UN]]'s [[Secretary-General]] [[Kofi Annan]] and Ambassador at Large for Special Assignments at the Swiss Ministry for Foreign Affairs. Pfirter was appointed Swiss ambassador to [[Colombia]] in 2008. ==External links== *[http://www.colsuizacam.com/Ingles/index.html Appointment as ambassador to Colombia] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Pfirter, Didier | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 1959 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Pfirter, Didier}} [[Category:1959 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Ambassadors of Switzerland to Colombia]] {{UN-bio-stub}} {{Switzerland-politician-stub}}
